mapper.select: SELECT NVL(ADMIN_ID, '') AS ADMIN_ID, NVL(ADMIN_PWD, '') AS ADMIN_PWD, NVL(ADMIN_NAME, '') AS ADMIN_NAME, NVL(ADMIN_PHONE, '') AS ADMIN_PHONE, NVL(ADMIN_EMAIL, '') AS ADMIN_EMAIL FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{value}

SELECT COMMU_IDK, COMMU_TAB, USER_ID, COMMU_TITLE, COMMU_CONTENT, COMMU_VIEWS, COMMU_LIKES, COMMU_STATUS, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(MOD_DATE,'YYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(DELETE_DATE,'YYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), FILE_CHECK, FILE_EXT FROM COMMU_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND COMMU_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{commuTitle} ||'%'
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{userId} ||'%'
AND COMMU_STATUS =#{commuStatus}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMU_BOARD SET COMMU_STATUS = CASE WHEN COMMU_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 'N' WHEN COMMU_STATUS = 'N' THEN 'Y' END WHERE COMMU_IDK = #{commuIdk}
UPDATE COMMENT_TABLE SET COMMENT_STATUS = CASE WHEN COMMENT_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 'N' WHEN COMMENT_STATUS = 'N' THEN 'Y' END WHERE COMMENT_IDK = #{commentIdk}
